channel.title: Projects on Philip C. Stevens
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Philip C. Stevens

item.title: Pet Predictor
item.description: form { margin: auto; width: 100%; } .result { margin: auto; width: 100%; border: 1px solid #ccc; } Select image to upload: Predicted breed: Prediction document.forms['form'].addEventListener('submit', (event) = { event.preventDefault(); document.getElementById('pred').innerHTML = type(event['image']) fetch(event.target.action, { method: 'POST', body: new URLSearchParams(new FormData(event.target)) // event.target is the form }).then((resp) = { return resp.json(); // or resp.text() or whatever the server sends }).then((body) = { body.getElementById('pred').innerHTML = 'Worked!'; }).
